standingobject

actor.t[120]

Superclass

Property
Summary

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

Standing posture - this is the default posture, which an actor normally uses for travel. Actors are generally in this posture any time they are not sitting on something, lying on something, or similar.

standing :   Posture
